Title: DOLCE Data Management
Description: Classification, Categorization & Ingest of Data aand Metadata at scale

Title: Dynamo
Description: Model Integration as a Service! Dynamo is a dynamic modelling modelling platform that allows modelers to leverage HPC to facilitate running models

Title: Sociotechnical Digital Twins
Description: Digital Twins are poised to revolutionize simulations. The REDI team is developing tools that streamline the creation and orchestration of Digital Twins using physics-based information to support participatory processes
